Controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Control interaction between View and Model objects

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(View v)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pauseBackgroundWork()
      Pauses background threads/stream updates.
      void refreshGUI()
      Refreshes the GUI streams if they are already initialized Note that this method does not update the stream's information.
      void resumeBackgroundWork()
      Resumes background threads/stream updates.
      void updateStream(StreamNode temp)
      Gets information for specified stream, updates the information, and adds it to GUI
      void updateStreams()
      Updates all stream information AND refreshes the GUI

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(View v)
        Constructor. Initializes any required background threads and updates. Handles initializing the GUI stream list as well as displaying the startup splash screen Also does basic bookkeeping for the model and view objects
        Parameters:
        v - View object

    • Method Detail

      • refreshGUI

        public void refreshGUI()
        Refreshes the GUI streams if they are already initialized Note that this method does not update the stream's information. It merely updates the GUI

      • updateStreams

        public void updateStreams()
        Updates all stream information AND refreshes the GUI

      • updateStream

        public void updateStream(StreamNode temp)
        Gets information for specified stream, updates the information, and adds it to GUI
        Parameters:
        temp - Stream to update information of

      • pauseBackgroundWork

        public void pauseBackgroundWork()
        Pauses background threads/stream updates. Mainly used when other GUIs are in the forefront. i.e. settings GUI or add stream GUI

      • resumeBackgroundWork

        public void resumeBackgroundWork()
        Resumes background threads/stream updates. Mainly used when other GUIs are in the forefront. i.e. settings GUI or add stream GUI
